article:
The better education people receive, the better world people will have. Through education, we can make the world a better place to live .
A country's education level is related with its wealth. For example, rich countries have enough money to support schools, pay teachers and buy books. In turn , education can _ the national wealth as it provides well-educated people to work in factories and offices.
Children in rich countries generally receive better education than _ in poor countries. In Japan, _ all the children go to primary school ,and one third of children stay on for higher education. Japanese children do well in not only science _ math. These _ are important for industries , so Japan is becoming stronger and stronger .
On the contrary , a lot of children _ get a good education in poor countries, especially those living in the _ . Many of them have to stay at home to help their family with the farm work.So they have no chance to _ much time on education.
However, educating the children in poor countries can bring great advantages. Please remember that it is one of the the best ways to make our world better.
